Package tealsim.physics.em

Electromagnetism simulations.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmperesLaw
    An application to show the tangent vectors and magnetic fields on the contour surrounding an open surface to make clear the geometric concepts behind Ampere's Law.
